SELECT COMMUNITY_SEQ, COMMON_SEQ, COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, COMMON_CONTENT, COMMON_TITLE, COMMON_HIT, COMMON_DEL_FLAG, IN_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IN_DATE, UP_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(UP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IN_DATE
FROM COMMUNITY WHERE COMMON_SEQ = '7' AND COMMON_DEL_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT COMMUNITY_SEQ, COMMON_SEQ, COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, TO_CHAR(COMMON_CONTENT) COMMON_CONTENT, COMMON_TITLE, COMMON_HIT, COMMON_DEL_FLAG, IN_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IN_DATE, UP_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(UP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IN_DATE
FROM COMMUNITY WHERE COMMON_SEQ = '7' AND COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{communitySeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY ( COMMUNITY_SEQ, COMMON_SEQ, COMMON_TITLE, COMMON_CONTENT, COMMON_DEL_FLAG, COMMON_HIT, IN_USER_ID, IN_DATE, UP_USER_ID, UP_DATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMUNITY)+1, '7', #{title}, #{contents}, 'N', '0', '1', SYSDATE, '1', SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUNITY SET COMMON_TITLE = #{title}, COMMON_CONTENT = #{contents}, UP_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{communitySeq}
UPDATE COMMUNITY SET COMMON_DEL_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{communitySeq}
UPDATE COMMUNITY SET COMMON_HIT = COMMON_HIT+ 1 WHERE COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{communitySeq}
